tool_description: Creates concordance entries showing all occurrences of specific words or phrases across scripture with usage patterns and contexts.

keyword.description: Word or phrase to create concordance for

scripture_scope.description: Scope of search: old_testament, new_testament, specific_book, or all

search_mode.description: Search mode: exact, stem, or conceptual

include_context.description: Include surrounding verse context for each occurrence

max_occurrences.description: Maximum number of occurrences to return (1-200)

sort_by.description: Sort results by: biblical_order, frequency, or relevance

error_messages: Empty keyword: Provide a word or phrase to search for.
Invalid scripture scope: Use one of [old_testament, new_testament, specific_book, all].
Invalid search mode: Use one of [exact, stem, conceptual].
Invalid max_occurrences: Must be an integer between 1 and 200.
Invalid sort option: Use one of [biblical_order, frequency, relevance].
No occurrences found: The specified keyword was not found in the selected scope.
usage: Provide a keyword and optionally specify search scope, mode, and formatting options. Returns comprehensive concordance with usage patterns and contextual information.

usage_patterns.description: Identified patterns in how the word is used
